briefTitle: A 24-week Study of Fluticasone Furoate/Vilanterol Inhalation Powder in Subjects of Asian Ancestry With COPD
officialTitle: A 24-week Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Fluticasone Furoate/Vilanterol Inhalation Powder Delivered Once Daily Via a Dry Powder Inhaler Compared With Placebo in Subjects of Asian Ancestry With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of fluticasone furoate/vilanterol Inhalation Powder compared with placebo over a 24 weeks treatment period in subjects of Asian ancestry with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Clinic Visit Pre-dose Trough FEV1 at Day 169
